data.title: About: Beasley Broadcast Group
data.meta_description: Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc., based in Naples, Florida, is an owner/operator of radio stations in the United States. As of June 2017, the company owned 63 stations under the Beasley Media Group name.
data.text:
dbo:abstract

Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc., based in Naples, Florida, is an owner/operator of radio stations in the United States. As of June 2017, the company owned 63 stations under the Beasley Media Group name. (en)

Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc. — американская радиокомпания из Нейплса, штат Флорида. К 2017 года контролировала 63 радиостанции в США. (ru)

dbp:netIncome

US $10.1 million ; $5.3 million (en)
